description:
Google has announced the release of Android 15, making the source code readily available through the Android Open Source Project (AOSP). Supported Pixel devices are set to receive the update in the coming weeks, with a wider rollout to devices from manufacturers like Samsung, Honor, and OnePlus planned for the coming months. “Android 15 continues... Read more »

The post Android 15: Developer productivity and UX take centre stage appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Android 15: Developer productivity and UX take centre stage
